product_title: Shy Girl Ripped High Waist Crop Flare Jeans
product_description: Edgy distressing enhances the lived-in look of these faded high-waist jeans finished with cropped, flared legs.
product_details_and_care:
Edgy distressing enhances the lived-in look of these faded high-waist jeans finished with cropped, flared legs.
